title: Loans
html:
Home » Services » Loans

Your vision.

Our purpose.

The right loan can change everything.

Your vision of reaching communities and changing lives drives us. As one of the nation’s largest, most experienced church loan providers, we want to be part of your ministry. Let’s take bold steps together for the Kingdom.

Get started

Every loan, 100% customized.

You won’t find this at a bank.

We’re more than a financial partner. We’re part of your ministry. It’s our pleasure to design a loan with rates and flexible terms specifically for you. The loans lineup below might give you a great place to start.

Permanent

Permanent, first-mortgage financing to help you purchase facilities or refinance existing loans. No short-sighted balloon notes that can leave your ministry financially vulnerable.

First Permanent Location

Designed exclusively for young, high-performing, growing churches to purchase a first permanent facility. This loan helps establish permanent roots, and leaves leasing in the past.

Construction

New construction or renovation, with interest-only payments during the project. After construction, there is a guaranteed conversion—at no cost—to permanent financing.

Facelift

Made for a quick win for “opportunity areas” (cracked parking lot, ancient carpet, music on cassette, etc.) while keeping cash in the bank and holding fundraising for larger future needs.

Vision

For large churches with a God-sized vision to buy a new campus, build a new facility, or refresh an existing building. Designed to be a ‘war chest’ of resources ready when God opens a door and time is of the essence.

Campus Startup

Often, a parent-affiliated church (PAC) is an effective way to reach more of the larger geographic community. This financing package was created for a PAC to plant or revitalize a daughter church.

Credit Line

Precisely what its name implies, a credit line is a convenient, customized alternative for short-term expenses, smaller renovation projects, and ongoing cash flow needs.

Which loan is right for me?

Ask my loan expert

Thank you!

Your submission has been received. We’ll be in touch shortly.

Ready to grow
when you are.

First things first, whether you’re simply curious or ready to greenlight your project: complete the inquiry form. It’s short, sweet, and vital. The information you provide will help share your vision with your consultant.

There’s more to every loan.

Smart consulting.

Construction surprises usually aren’t fun. Reducing those through front-of-project, detailed consultation has saved numerous churches hundreds of thousands of dollars in ‘surprise’ expenses and fees. Included with every construction loan.

Teamwork.

We’re part of your team. Your AGFinancial consultant is ready to answer questions, hear your dreams, listen to your concerns, and make it all as easy as possible. We don’t do broker fees, so that relationship you experience? It’s genuine.

Roots with values.

Over the past 75+ years, AGFinancial has funded more than $1.6 billion in loans to an impressive variety of churches and ministries. Through it all, and just like you, we want to honor Jesus in our partnerships and how we do business.

Run some numbers. Impress your pastor.

Vision fuel.
One bold step at a time.

Loans guided by your ministry, driven by your mission, and powered by AGFinancial.

Start the process
Explore your options. Zero pressure.
Let’s talk about making it happen.

“With AGFinancial’s partnership, we’re excited for what’s ahead.”

—Jen DeWeerdt, City First Church

“Their experience has been a game-changer for us.”

—Rich Wilkerson Jr, Vous Church

“We couldn’t be more pleased with how easy it is to work with their team.”

—Mike Santiago, Focus Church

Testimonials found on this site are examples of what we have done for other clients, and what some of our clients have said about us. However, we cannot guarantee the results in any case. Your results may vary and every situation is different. No compensation was provided for these testimonials.
